body_html:
Hi all, i test this PR and works fine, i optimize a Model created with estimator API (@slanab) with this code. Removing this nodes are important for inference if you want to use in third party libraries like OpenCV DNN modules that not support dropout nodes for inference.

Good job @kbalka , waiting for the @petewarden review and commit to master branch.

body:
Hi all, i test this PR and works fine, i optimize a Model created with estimator API (@slanab) with this code. Removing this nodes are important for inference if you want to use in third party libraries like OpenCV DNN modules that not support dropout nodes for inference.
 
Good job @kbalka , waiting for the @petewarden review and commit to master branch.
